title: Ukraine hails 'real results' after Musk restricts Russian Starlink use
summary_full: Starlink-enabled drones have been linked to a number of recent deadly attacks by Russia on Ukraine.
summary_public: Starlink-enabled drones have been linked to a number of recent deadly attacks by Russia on Ukraine.
